name: Amulaire Thermal Technology
overview: Amulaire Thermal Technology, Inc. provides thermal solutions for power electronics in hybrid electric (HEV) and electric vehicle (EV), wind turbine, and LED lighting applications. It offers cold plate that is used in liquid-cooled insulating gate bipolar transistors modules for HEV and EV; vapor chamber products for servers, graphic cards, power amplifiers, and high power LEDs; AlSiC base plates; and subsystem or system solutions to customers. The company also provides cold plates for use in mild and full HEV; commercial and agricultural vehicles; and military vehicles
